remixlab.proscene

Class MouseAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.Agent
      • remixlab.proscene.MouseAgent

  • public class MouseAgent
extends Agent
    Proscene mouse-agent. A Processing fully fledged mouse Agent.
    See Also:
    Agent, KeyAgent, DroidKeyAgent, DroidTouchAgent

        public void setPickingMode(MouseAgent.PickingMode mode)
        Sets the agent pickingMode(). Either MouseAgent.PickingMode.MOVE or MouseAgent.PickingMode.CLICK.
        See Also:
        pickingMode()

      • pickingMode

        public MouseAgent.PickingMode pickingMode()

        See Also:
        setPickingMode(PickingMode)

      • sensitivities

        public float[] sensitivities(MotionEvent event)
        Description copied from class: Agent
        Returns the sensitivities used in Agent.handle(BogusEvent) to MotionEvent.modulate(float[]).
        Overrides:
        sensitivities in class Agent

      • setXSensitivity

        public void setXSensitivity(float sensitivity)
        Defines the xSensitivity().

      • xSensitivity

        public float xSensitivity()
        Returns the x sensitivity.

        Default value is 1. A higher value will make the event more efficient (usually meaning a faster motion). Use a negative value to invert the along x-Axis motion direction.

      • setYSensitivity

        public void setYSensitivity(float sensitivity)
        Defines the ySensitivity().

      • ySensitivity

        public float ySensitivity()
        Returns the y sensitivity.

        Default value is 1. A higher value will make the event more efficient (usually meaning a faster motion). Use a negative value to invert the along y-Axis motion direction.
